org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class RandomCodeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.helpers.RandomCodeGenerator

  • public abstract class RandomCodeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates random codes based upon ValueSet URIs, with the help of a FHIR terminology service API.

    The URL for the terminology service is configured using the generate.terminology_service_url property.

        Gets a random code from the expansion of a ValueSet.
        Parameters:

        seed - a random seed to ensure reproducibility of this result
